EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary O’Reilly eBook: Data Warehousing with Greenplum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We invite you to download the new O’Reilly eBook: Data Warehousing with Greenplum: Open Source Massively Parallel Data Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/data-warehousing-with-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=oreilly-ebook-q2-2017]]>, authored by Pivotal’s Marshall Presser. This free eBook provides an excellent introduction to Greenplum, from architecture to data organization and storage, data loading, running queries, and text analytics. You’ll also find information on monitoring and managing Greenplum deployment options, and much more. Anyone with a background in IT, relational databases, Big Data, or analytics can benefit from this book. Get your complimentary copy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/data-warehousing-with-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=oreilly-ebook-q2-2017]]> today!
Enjoy, The Pivotal Team
